Bernie Sanders Patrick Leahy ( D-Vt.), a senior member of the Senate Appropriations Committee, said heat in the winter is not a consumer choice. It's not a luxury. Instead of cutting heating assistance, Patrick Leahy said Congress should end tax breaks for oil companies that "are just using them to make obscene profits." Sen. in a 2003 national security meeting when he was told that Saddam Hussein was offering a$ 60 million bounty to kill Donald Rumsfeld 's daughters. "I was concerned," Donald Rumsfeld told ABC News on Tuesday. Of course the president and his family had secret service protection. My family did not. And it was a somewhat awkward moment in the meeting, he said. The plot also targeted President Bush 's two daughters, Donald Rumsfeld said, and President Bush urged him to take it seriously because the administration had killed Saddam Hussein 's sons. Vermont businesses and their employees. I look forward to working with Sen. Bernie Sanders Patrick Leahy and Sen. Bernie Sanders Welch to get the appropriate waivers and flexibility for us to go forward toward a single-payer system." Welch said, When Vermont innovates, the nation often follows our lead. Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said, "While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward.
